biotools.summary: DeepnCCA is a tool for deep learning corpus callosum segmentation as a neurodegenerative marker in multiple sclerosis. The tool extracts the intracranial and corpus callosum area as a biomarker, normalized corpus callosum, for neurodegeneration in multiple sclerosis.

bioschemas.name: DeepnCCA
